trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Roswell
There were no other sightings in Roswell on or around November 18th 1999
divs: Sighting DetailsThere were sightings nightly in Roswell, Georgia at the time, and I was out going to the grocery store, then the pharmacy, and as I was waiting to turn into the parking lot of the pharmacy, I looked up and saw a lightpost, and for no apparent reason then looked beyond it and saw 3 discs, or what I'd call flying saucers. It didn't surprise me since there'd been so much talk with all the recent sightings. They were just hovering, and it was a clear glimpse I got, too. I don't question that they were UFOs, I KNOW that they were. I know exactly what I saw. I ended up just going about my business at the pharmacy and have never really spoken of the incident in fear of being deemed "crazy." Notice, I chose to remain anonymous! That's because I still have that fear of being deemed "crazy."
